starter.name: Chilli chicken skewer
starter.description: Diced chicken sauté with veggies in a chilli sauce .

starter.name: RedHorn fish finger
starter.description: Fish coated in a flour batter, deep fried and served with Tarter sauce.

starter.name: Garden fresh spring roll
starter.description: Home made vegetable spring rolls, served with a side of Chef’s special cocktail sauce.

starter.name: Potatoes crocket
starter.description: Potatoes mixed with minced meat, veggies and cheese, deep fried and served with Chef’s special cocktail sauce.

starter.name: Easy fried calamari
starter.description: Calamari marinated in buttermilk, smoked garlic powder and fried will All-Purpose flour, served with Tarter sauce.

starter.name: Chicken platter
starter.description: Devour the best of our Appetizers – Featuring three different chicken wing flavours: Suya chicken wings , honey chicken wings and marinade chicken wings served with potatoe fries, plantain fries and Yam fries.

starter.name: Honey Turkey
starter.description: Grilled Turkey sauté in honey marinade sauce served with French fries.

starter.name: Greek chicken Gyros
starter.description: Sauté chicken with veggie stuffed in a Tortilla/ sharwama wrap.

main courses.name: Veggie Rigatoni
main courses.description: Rigatoni pasta stir fry in a tomatoe sauce and veggies.

main courses.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
main courses.description: Fettuccine pasta adorned with tender mushroom & a creamy alfredo sauce.

main courses.name: Meatball veggies pasta
main courses.description: Stir fry Pasta in veggies served with meatballs cooked in a tomato sauce .

main courses.name: Lasagna Al forno
main courses.description: Pasta lasagne in béchamel and a rich marinated meat sauce topped with a blanket of Parmesan cheese .

rice special.name: Oriental Rice
rice special.description: Basmati rice sauté with minced meat and veggies, drizzled with touch of soy sauce, oyster sauce and sesame oil .

rice special.name: Yaggi Rice
rice special.description: Basmati rice cooked in tomato sauce with beef chunks and suya spices .

rice special.name: Cajun Rice
rice special.description: Rice sauté with veggies drizzled with olive oil and Cajun spices.

rice special.name: Garlic butter rice with chicken curry
rice special.description: Garlic butter rice served with chicken, cooked in a curry masala sauce .

burger special.name: Grilled chicken burger
burger special.description: Grilled chicken breast, topped with aioli sauce, lettuce, tomato, onions and cheese on a freshly baked home made bun, served with French fries.

burger special.name: Crispy fish burger
burger special.description: Fish breaded in bread crumbs, topped with aioli sauce , lettuce ,tomatoes, onions and cheese on a freshly baked homemade bun, served with French fries.

chicken special.name: Chicken condo blue
chicken special.description: Chicken breast stuffed in with sliced cheese and Turkey ham deep friend and served with mushroom sauce.

chicken special.name: Chicken Lap curry
chicken special.description: Marinated chicken Lap in a rich curry sauce with fragrant buttered rice .

chicken special.name: Chicken Royal
chicken special.description: Diced chicken cooked in a rich creamy mushroom sauce served with steam rice .

soups.name: Classic Goat-meat soup
soups.description: Diced Goat meat cooked in pepper and traditional spices.

soups.name: Tomatoes basil soup
soups.description: Plum tomatoes Cooked with chef’s special spices with basil leaf.

soups.name: Cream of chicken soup
soups.description: Diced chicken cooked in a creamy soup .

grills.name: RedHorn special
grills.description: ( fish, jumbo prawns ,gizzard suya , corn, yam fries and roasted plantain ).

salads.name: Greek salad
salads.description: Mix of baby cucumber , radish ,tomatoes , onions , feta cheese and olives dressed with salt , Greek oregano ,lemon juice and olive oil .

salads.name: Chicken avocado salad
salads.description: Grilled chicken breast, chopped Roman lettuce, avocado drizzle with olive oil and a beautifully created salad dressing.

desert.name: REGAL VELVET CHEESE CAKE
desert.description: A sumptuous crimson cheesecake with a delicate red velvet crumbs plated on glaze swoosh, garnished with gold leaf and dusted with edible red powder.

desert.name: GLIDED CHURROS WITH CHOCOLATE FONDANT
desert.description: Plated on a bed of splattered dark chocolate glaze, cinnamon sugar and an array of micro veggies with a scoop of caramel flavored ice cream.

desert.name: THE MAYFAIR ECLAIRS
desert.description: A plate of white and dark chocolate glazed garnished with gold leaves and chocolate chips.

desert.name: WARM CHOCOLATE FONDANT
desert.description: A warm fondant chocolate plated on a dust of chocolate powder topped with ice cream and mint leave.

desert.name: TROPICAL JEWEL
desert.description: A dessert pineapple creme brûlée served in a pineapple with caramelized sugar and dollops of ice cream and micro veggies.

desert.name: CRÈME CITRUS
desert.description: A-slice of a creamy vanilla and lemon zest cake garnished with lemon curds, mint leaves lemon zest and citrus peel.
